name: The Evil Device
description:
🚨 VOLUNTEER WANTED 🚨

The police department needs your help.

After many disappearances, we believe we are near the suspect.

We must connect remotely to his PC, but we cannot use the internal devices.

We are looking for a profile with great deduction capacity, that can investigate and think outside the box.

You’ll keep in contact with an officer, but we cannot guarantee the connection to stay stable. Anything could happen.

⚠️ HIGH RISK ⚠️

Do you dare reveal the mystery? Download the App and enter the system to start.

------------------

📖 Interactive chapter based on the book "Malditos Dispositivos" by Mariana Kirzner y Martín Selem.  Available in Argentina.
